title: Remove 'WhatsApp' text label from floating WhatsApp button

requirements.summary: Remove the text label 'WhatsApp' from the FloatingWhatsAppButton component so only the WhatsApp icon is displayed
acceptanceCriteria: The floating WhatsApp button displays only the WhatsApp icon with no text label.
The text 'WhatsApp' is not visible anywhere on the floating button.
The button remains fully functional and still links to the WhatsApp chat URL.
The button layout/positioning is not broken after removing the text.

file_operations.description: Remove or hide the text span element containing 'WhatsApp' from the button JSX. Keep the WhatsApp icon and all button functionality intact. Ensure the button remains properly positioned and styled after removing the text element. The element at XPath /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/a[1]/span[1] (the text span) should be removed or set to display:none.
